The Ribbon Framework will automatically apply keytips to every command. However, if you want more control over the keytips used, you can specify them yourself. A keytip is not limited to a single character.

member.name: P:RibbonLib.Controls.RibbonTabGroup.Label
member.summary: This is the label of the command as it will appear on the ribbon.

member.name: P:RibbonLib.Controls.RibbonTabGroup.TooltipTitle
member.summary: The title of the tooltip (hint) that appear when the user hovers the mouse over the command. This title is displayed in bold at the top of the tooltip.

member.name: P:RibbonLib.Controls.RibbonTabGroup.TooltipDescription
member.summary: The description of the tooltip as it appears below the title.
